question:
Consider the following statements with respect to the Lok Sabha:
  1. Lok Sabha must meet at least thrice each year with no more than four-month gap between sessions
  2. Question of disqualification on Ground of Defection is decided by the Speaker for MPs from Lok Sabha
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Lok Sabha must meet at least twice with no more than six month between sessions
